summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1486, for the improvement of Roy Street, in the City of Seattle, from 2nd Avenue North to 5th Avenue North, by regarding the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary wooden curbs, gutters and cross walks, under Ordinance No. 15949 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
